DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether real TMS effective sham TMS reduce pain follow surgery
DOC.brief_title: Determination Analgesic Effect From One Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) Treatment Following Vaginal Reconstructive Surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: To determine amount opiate pain medication administer week follow surgery . Subjects receive identical pain control regimen . Participants undergo TMS motor threshold assessment ETSU Innovation Lab prior plan surgery . At appointment baseline Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , Center Epidemiological Studies 10-item Depression scale ( CES-D ) visual analog scale ( VAS ) rating pain mood obtained.VAS rating also do even follow week . One day surgery , subject return Innovation lab TMS . A total 22 subject recruit study . At return visit , 11 receive 40 minute 10 Hz repetitive TMS 120 % rMT ( 4-second stimulation train 26-second interstimulus interval ) . The 11 participant receive sham treatment identical setting . Participants , medical staff provide clinical care patient raters know whether participant receive real sham TMS . Patients keep log pain medication use follow week addition VAS rating . Follow-up occur one week TMS therapy . The subject turn log repeat BDI CES-D scale .
DOC.criteria: Dental filling , implant , bridge work permit . Metal object within 30 cm brain . These include cochlear implant , stent , vagus nerve stimulators , heart device , bullet fragment , jewelry . Monitors , earring , hear aid , eyeglass , jewelry , hair barrette , cell phone , digital sound record device player remove . Actively suicidal . Older 70 year . Seizures , stroke , dementia , movement disorder . Pregnant nursing . Permanent makeup metal ink . Medication known increase risk seizure .
